create table smartanswer( idx int primary key auto_increment, num int, nickname varchar(30), content varchar(1000), writeday datetime, foreign key(num) references smartboard(num) on delete cascade)
create table shop( shopnum smallint auto_increment primary key, category varchar(30), sangpum varchar(30), photo varchar(50), price int, ipgoday varchar(20))

create table cart( idx smallint auto_increment primary key, shopnum smallint, num smallint, cnt int, cartday datetime, foreign key(shopnum) references shop(shopnum) on delete cascade, foreign key(num) references member(num) on delete cascade)
DELETE FROM shop WHERE (shopnum = 1)
DELETE FROM shop WHERE (shopnum = 2)
DELETE FROM shop WHERE (shopnum = 3) AND (category = '악세사리') AND (sangpum = '스카프') AND (photo = 'acc02.png') AND (price = 0) AND (ipgoday = '<NULL>')
DELETE FROM shop WHERE (shopnum = 3)
delete from shop
DELETE FROM cart WHERE (idx = 1)
select c.idx,s.sangpum,s.shopnum,s.photo,s.price,c.cnt,c.cartday from cart c,shop s,member m where c.shopnum=s.shopnum
select c.idx,s.sangpum,s.shopnum,s.photo,s.price,c.cnt,c.cartday from cart c,shop s,member m where c.shopnum=s.shopnum order by idx
select c.idx,s.sangpum,s.shopnum,s.photo,s.price,c.cnt,c.cartday from cart c,shop s,member where c.shopnum=s.shopnum order by idx
select c.idx,s.sangpum,s.shopnum,s.photo,s.price,c.cnt,c.cartday from cart c,shop s where c.shopnum=s.shopnum order by idx
select m.name 구매자,c.idx,s.sangpum,s.shopnum,s.photo,s.price,c.cnt,c.cartday from cart c,shop s,member m where c.shopnum=s.shopnum and c.num=m.num order by idx
select m.name '구매자',c.idx,s.sangpum,s.shopnum,s.photo,s.price,c.cnt,c.cartday from cart c,shop s,member m where c.shopnum=s.shopnum and c.num=m.num order by idx
select m.name,c.idx,s.sangpum,s.shopnum,s.photo,s.price,c.cnt,c.cartday from cart c,shop s,member m where c.shopnum=s.shopnum and c.num=m.num order by idx
select m.num,m.name,c.idx,s.sangpum,s.shopnum,s.photo,s.price,c.cnt,c.cartday from cart c,shop s,member m where c.shopnum=s.shopnum and c.num=m.num order by idx
select c.idx,s.sangpum,s.shopnum,s.photo,s.price,c.cnt,c.cartday from cart c,shop s,member m where c.shopnum=s.shopnum and c.num=m.num order by idx

insert into test values(1,'yezi')
drop table test

create table member( member_num smallint auto_increment primary key, member_name varchar(20), member_addr varchar(1000), member_hp varchar(30), member_pass varchar(30), member_id varchar(30), member_email varchar(40), member_birth varchar(30))

create table item( item_num smallint auto_increment primary key, item_name varchar(50), item_price int, item_img varchar(20), item_sub_title varchar(100), item_info_img varchar(30), item_seller varchar(20), item_package_type varchar(20), item_package_detail varchar(200), item_sell_unit varchar(20), item_weight varchar(20), item_origin varchar(30), item_allergy varchar(200), item_warning varchar(200), item_detail varchar(2000), item_category varchar(30))

create table review( review_num smallint auto_increment primary key, member_num smallint, item_num smallint, review_img varchar(60), review_content varchar(1000), review_date datetime, review_like int, foreign key(member_num) references member(member_num) on delete cascade, foreign key(item_num) references item(item_num) on delete cascade)

create table cart( cart_num smallint auto_increment primary key, member_num smallint, item_num smallint, cart_cnt int, foreign key(member_num) references member(member_num) on delete cascade, foreign key(item_num) references item(item_num) on delete cascade)

create table jjim( jjim_num smallint auto_increment primary key, member_num smallint, item_num smallint, foreign key(member_num) references member(member_num) on delete cascade, foreign key(item_num) references item(item_num) on delete cascade)
delete from item where item_num>9
delete from item where item_num>33
select count(*) from item
select i.item_name,r.review_content from review r,item i where r.item_num=i.item_num
select item_num, item_name from item where item_name like '%달%'
select item_num, item_name from item
select item_num, item_name from item where item_name like '%달'
select item_num, item_name from item where item_name like '%고%'
select item_num, item_name from item where item_name like '%계%'
select item_num, item_name from item where item_name like '%란%'
select i.item_num,i.item_name,r.review_content from review r,item i where r.item_num=i.item_num
select i.item_num,i.item_name,r.review_content from review r,item i where r.item_num=i.item_num and i.item_category='meat'
